chemoreception.notes: As parasites, Myxobolidae likely rely on chemoreception to locate hosts (fish and annelids/polychaetes) and suitable environments within those hosts. This is inferred based on the parasitic lifestyle common to the family.

mechanoreception.notes: Myxobolidae likely possess mechanoreception to detect changes in their environment and interact with host tissues. This is inferred based on the parasitic lifestyle common to the family.

vision.notes: The presence or absence of vision in Myxobolidae is currently unknown based on the provided context.
